thread.title: ANGIE SISSINE

author: ANGIE SISSINE
title: ANGIE SISSINE
text: This was my first time ordering with Name Tag Country and I was a little nervous ordering from an On-line Company but the process was extremely easy. The color on the website was showing a different shade of blue than what I wanted, I called Customer Service, they were very friendly and helpful and we received replacements only a few days later. I will definitely order from them again.
